0.3.2: [Fixed] Make sure that the file cache for the source maps is per run and not per cli instance
[Fixed] Tests cannot be generated in a loop (see #177)
0.3.1: [Fixed] Fix printing the result of the tests
[Improved] Show when the tests start running again in watch mode
0.3.0: [Improved] Use variable declarations instead of function declarations in the tests
[New] Use util module shipped with Sketch
[Improved] more expressive error when failing to load a test suite
0.2.2: [Fixed] Use variable declarations instead of function declarations in the tests
0.2.1: [Fixed] Fix an bug when the path to Sketch have a space
